name: Tom's Toolbox
tagline: A set of core functions and classes to ease every days .Net development tasks.
body:
# Tom's Toolbox A set of core functions and classes to ease every days .Net development tasks. Contains many extension methods, a WPF Composite MVVM framework, Controls etc... - Browse the documentation to find out how this library can support you: [Tom's Toolbox](http://tomstoolbox.azurewebsites.net) - Use [NuGet](https://www.nuget.org/packages/TomsToolbox.Wpf/) to integrate the library into your projects - Download the source code to integrate the parts of interest with your own tool set.


Powerd by         

Support this Project:
